ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Except the chosen creatures of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: except the sincere servants of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Except the chosen bondmen of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Save the chosen servants of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: But not the servants of Allah, the purified ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: except the chosen servants of God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Except the bondmen of Allah sincere.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Except the sincere and devoted Servants of Allah (among them).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Except the chosen slaves of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: except the sincere worshipers of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Except the chosen servants of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:128] — [all] except God’s delivered servants, namely, the believers, who will be saved from it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Save single minded slaves of Allah) save the salves of Allah who are sincere in their worship and have faith in Allah's divine Oneness; these will not be tormented.
